name: unite
constraint: (declare-const CO_SPEC Int)(declare-const CI_SPEC Int)(declare-const RO_SPEC Int)(declare-const RI_SPEC Int)(assert (= RO_SPEC RI_SPEC))(assert (= CO_SPEC (- CI_SPEC 1)))
(declare-const IG_SPEC Int)(declare-const OG_SPEC Int)(assert (= IG_SPEC OG_SPEC))
(declare-const IH_SPEC Int)(declare-const OH_SPEC Int)(assert (>= (+ IH_SPEC 1) OH_SPEC))
(declare-const IC_SPEC Int)(declare-const FRESH_K_SPEC Int)(declare-const OC_SPEC Int)(assert (= (+ IC_SPEC 1 FRESH_K_SPEC) OC_SPEC))(assert (>= FRESH_K_SPEC 0))
